Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: It’s intensely frustrating how unpredictably the scale numbers fluctuate due to things that are not actually changes in body fat. And even when I intellectually *know* I can’t have gained any weight other than water or digestion matter, that number changing in ways I don’t like just devastates me.   Gotta ride it out, which is hard, but over longer time scales the fluctuations are a wash. I hope there are some good moments in your day today <3
